settings.altdorf.name: Altdorf Endeavours
settings.altdorf.hint: Adds the endeavours included in Altdorf: Crown of the Empire.
settings.uia.name: Up in Arms Endeavours
settings.uia.hint: Adds the endeavours for warriors included in Up in Arms.
settings.wom.name: Winds of Magic Endeavours
settings.wom.hint: Adds the arcane endeavours included in Winds of Magic.
settings.soc.name: Sea of Claws Endeavours
settings.soc.hint: Replace all between adventures endeavours with the ones listed in Sea of Claws. If Up in Arms Endeavours is enabled, the available ones will be added
settings.lustria.name: Lustria Endeavours
settings.lustria.hint: Adds the Lustrian between adventures endeavours and replace all travel endeavours with the ones listed in Lustria.
settings.dwarf.name: Dwarfen Endeavours
settings.dwarf.hint: Adds the Dwarfen between adventures endeavours and replace all travel endeavours with the delving endeavours (Dwarf Player's Guide & Lords of Stone and Steel).
settings.helf.name: Intrigue Endeavours
settings.helf.hint: Adds intriguing between adventures endeavours (High Elf Player's Guide & Sea Wardens of Cothique).
settings.criminal.name: Criminal Endeavours (Deft Steps Light Fingers)
settings.criminal.hint: Adds the criminal endeavours included in Deft Steps Light Fingers.
settings.organizedcrime.name: Organized Crime Endeavours (Deft Steps Light Fingers)
settings.organizedcrime.hint: Adds the organized crime endeavours included in Deft Steps Light Fingers.
settings.gaol.name: Gaol Break Endeavour (Deft Steps Light Fingers)
settings.gaol.hint: Replace the between adventures endeavours with the ones available in gaol, as listed in Deft Steps Light Fingers.
settings.wilderness.name: Wilderness Travel Endeavours (Deft Steps Light Fingers)
settings.wilderness.hint: Replace the travel endeavours with the wilderness travel endeavours, as listed in Deft Steps Light Fingers.
settings.shelley.name: Shelley Endeavour
settings.shelley.hint: Adds the endeavour granted by Scealleah 'Shelley' Thorncobble (Patrons of the Old World I).
settings.farforian.name: Farforian Endeavour
settings.farforian.hint: Adds the endeavour granted by Farforian Whiteshore (Patrons of the Old World I).
settings.willhelm.name: Willhelm Endeavour
settings.willhelm.hint: Adds the endeavour granted by Willhelm von Vaulk (Patrons of the Old World II).
settings.angela.name: Angela Endeavour
settings.angela.hint: Adds the endeavour granted by Angela Hedame (Patrons of the Old World II).
settings.rosendorn.name: Rosendorn Endeavour
settings.rosendorn.hint: Adds the endeavour granted by Bryannah 'der Briekäse Rosendorn (Patrons of the Old World II).
settings.ulricsson.name: Ulricsson Endeavour
settings.ulricsson.hint: Adds the endeavour granted by Diel Ulricsson (Patrons of the Old World II).
WFRP4eEndeavours.NoToken: You must select at least one PC token
WFRP4eEndeavours.Endeavour.Label: Choose an endeavour:
WFRP4eEndeavours.Endeavour.Nothing: I will do nothing in particular.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Link.Quartermaster:
@UUID[JournalEntry.JSMqi4MYrqsPBDUL.JournalEntryPage.NpSObNMKDAwuCeNw#the-quartermaster-shuffle]{The Quartermaster Shuffle}.

@UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-endeavours.wfrp4e-endeavours-items.Item.RFeMoXNQ6qpYPwgG]{Find a Job} and @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-endeavours.wfrp4e-endeavours-items.Item.v1Ax92hFkPuR4xTz]{Do the Job}
WFRP4eEndeavours.Link.Visionaries:
@UUID[JournalEntry.cUF8jry7qNszfz3j.JournalEntryPage.8MC3cC9cSuEsJqJy].

@UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-endeavours.wfrp4e-endeavours-items.Item.Y8S3DwkxYEFpMUdM]{Foment Dissent with Rosendorn}.
Then @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-endeavours.wfrp4e-endeavours-items.Item.ZYiQGec6Gi6K85lz]{Rosendorn's Prophecy} for Rosendorn
WFRP4eEndeavours.Link.Gaol:
Gaol Break.

@UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-endeavours.wfrp4e-endeavours-items.Item.JURiC50BW5u0I6Lb]{Gaol Break}.

The GM may add further complexity to the break.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Link.WatchWilderness:
Watch.

If you have any @Condition[Fatigued] Condition, you must roll to @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-endeavours.wfrp4e-endeavours-items.Item.eoHxUiW86aCSTmct]{stay awake}.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Link.Trapping:
Customise a Trapping.

@UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-endeavours.wfrp4e-endeavours-items.Item.HMg9eR3qVXf7QBbI]{Start Customizing an Item} or @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-endeavours.wfrp4e-endeavours-items.Item.higJlkNZQMjwyHjh]{Repair Trapping}.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Research: You don't find useful or accurate information.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Mark: You don't find anything useful about your mark.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Woodcraft: The poor shelter you create won't save your group from this inclement weather. You'll have to Test for @UUID[JournalEntry.NS3YGlJQxwTggjRX.JournalEntryPage.WCivInLZrqEtZzF4#exposure]{Exposure}.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Forage: You search and search, but find nothing.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Information: Nobody is willing to tell you anything.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Watch: Pretty sure nobody is behind those bushes...
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Patronage: You didn't choose a good play to patronize.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Penance: Your god isn't happy with your penance. Gain one @Condition[Fatigued] Condition. If fumbled, roll in the @Table[wrath] instead.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.UnusualWeapon: You need more training with this weapon.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Alcatini: Your companions don't learn anything from you.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Job: Your old associates don't know of a job that can help you.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Job2: You've got the item, but the price may be too high.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Familiar: You aren't able to improve your familiar... yet.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Mapmaking: You need to work more on your map.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Trade: You thought you had a profitable business at hand... Reality tought otherwise.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.DoubleShifts: Work pays, but you're so @Condition[Fatigued]... Maybe you've contracted one of those tropical diseases?
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Woodcutters: Your team works as hard as they can.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.ForageforFood: You search and search, but can't find any food.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.WatchLustria: Everything is trying to kill you... Maybe you are making everything worse?
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Skaven: You don't find new or useful information on skaven.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Null: Some of Wilhelm's Null Trait has rubbed off on you.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Visionaries: Rosendorn is struck by a terrible revelation about you which she absolutely refuses to share with you.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Witness: You don't learn anything new from Ulricsson.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.BlackMarketBuy: Nothing of interest in the black market this time.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Gang: You need more efforts to grow your gang.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Influence: Your influence is not as big as you expected.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Navigate: You're leading your party astray or lost.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Drakefire: You just can't concoct drakefire, if it didn't explode.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Failure.Aspersions: The target discovers the source of the aspersions. It could even mar your own reputation.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Animal: Your animal learned a new trick! You can add a @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.V0naR1YbYCl0KIxp]{Trained} Creature Trait.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.DissentGossip: You are ready to start talking to the masses.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Combat: You may reverse a Test with the associated Skill once during your next adventure.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Mark: You discover something useful about your mark.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Woodcraft: You and your companions do not need to Test for Exposure due to inclement weather.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Forage: You found what you were searching for.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Practice: You may reverse a Test using {skill} once during the following adventure, or any subsequent Stages of travel.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Watch: Nobody will surprise you in your watch!
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.CampRest: This comfortable camp allows you to reduce Fatigued conditions from a character.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.CampHeal: This comfortable camp allows you to heal a character.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.College: Studying in the College helps with your magic studies.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Patronage: You are a good patron of the arts.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Penance: Your god is moved by your penance. Removed 1 Sin Point, or 2 if you rolled +4 or more SL.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.MagicItem: You reveal some of the item's secrets.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Alcatini: Your shouting, threats, speeches, alcohol and bribery make effect! One or more companions gain or enhance the @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.J9MK0AIaTbvd5oF6]{Drilled} Talent.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Punchausen: Your stories are printed and you are paid [[2d10]] @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.KB8HgDz56dh2w7w1]{silver shillings}.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Leitdorf: You mastered this technique. Will you dare to use it?
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Job: An old associate knows about a suitable job.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Job2: The item, but you are not unharmed.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Familiar: Your familiar has a chance to improve!
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Mapmaking: You created a beautiful and accurate map.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Trade: You thought you had a profitable business at hand... and were right!
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Ship: Your ship is starting to look like it's former self.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Crew: You've got a crew to be proud of.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Woodcutters: You bring out the best of your team.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Shelter: You find a place to shelter yourselves.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.ForageforFood: You find food to feed your group.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Boat: Your boat is in better shape now.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Visionaries: Rosendorn catches a glimpse of your immediate future.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Witness: Ulricsson's lessons teach you more about Sigmar's life, but maybe it's heresy?
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.BlackMarketBuy: The black market has exactly what you need.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.BlackMarketSell: A profitable day at the black market.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Identities: You're getting into your character in-depth. You may count as having the @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.PJ4oxDExnuFNr2Fi]{Secret Identity} Talent for the next adventure.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Gang: Your gang is growing bigger and bigger!
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Organising: Your gang is maintained. You've got an action to perform.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Planning: Your contributions will help in the journey.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Haste: You keep pace. And the rest of your party?
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Navigate: You guide your party on the right path.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.MakeCamp: The ground is prepared for a restuful night's sleep.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Repair: You are able to repair the trapping.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Success.Aspersions: The aspersions are spread, but the target can have agents of their own.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Notification.NoSkill: You don't have the right skill!
WFRP4eEndeavours.Notification.NoTrade: You don't have any Trade skill!
WFRP4eEndeavours.Camp.Choose: The camp will be used to Heal or Rest?
WFRP4eEndeavours.UnusualWeapon.ChooseSki: Which weapon do you want to master?
WFRP4eEndeavours.Research.Choose: Do you want to use your Skill or your Intelligence?
WFRP4eEndeavours.Research.ChooseSkill: Choose a skill to research. If you don't choose one you'll use your Intelligence.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Punchausen.ChooseSkill: Choose a skill to sell your stories.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Job2.ChooseSkill: Choose a Skill for the job.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Ship.ChooseSkill: Choose a skill to maintain ships.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Boat.ChooseSkill: Choose a skill to repair the boat.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Planning.Choose: How do you want to contribute to the planning?
WFRP4eEndeavours.Map.ChooseSkill: Choose a skill to create the map.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Journal.ChooseSkill: Choose a skill to write your journal.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Drakefire.ChooseSkill: Choose a skill to write your concoct.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Archives.ChooseSkill: Choose a skill for the consult.
WFRP4eEndeavours.Repair.ChooseSkill: Choose a skill to repair the trapping.
WFRP4eEndeavours.RepairReputation.Choose: Choose a skill to repair your reputation.
WFRP4eEndeavours.InitialSLTooltip: If comes from an Invent! endeavour
WFRP4eEndeavours.RepairReputation.Choose: Do you want to repair your reputation or the reputation of another character?
WFRP4eEndeavours.BlackMarket.Choose: Do you want to buy or to sell?
WFRP4eEndeavours.Gaol.Minor: ...in a cell at a watch post
WFRP4eEndeavours.MoneytoBurn.Title: Money to Burn
WFRP4eEndeavours.MoneytoBurn.Hint:
The money of these actors will be burned:
{players}This action can't be undone. Are you sure?
